wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Charles Astley Fowler, CB, CSI, DSO (9 November 1865 – 7 January 1940) was an officer in the British Indian Army from 1886 to 1921, serving in both India and Europe. He commanded the 37th Brigade at the Battle of Loos in France in 1915 and was a Divisional Commander during the Third Afghan War in 1919.
